Dusk Priestess: "[What is Seal Stone Collection?]" 1. Collecting seal stones and Seven Signs score: - Collecting seal stones is the most common method of earning points in the Seven Signs competition. The group that collects the most seal stones receives a higher score. - The score a group receives for collecting seal stones will count for 50% of the final score. The remaining 50% of the final score will be determined by the score the group earns during the Festival of Darkness. 2. Collecting seal stones: - To obtain seal stones you must kill "Nephilm, Gigant, Lilim and Lith". - After you collect the seal stones, offer them to a Dusk Priestess. Go visit a Dusk Priestess located in each village and use the menu option of "Offer Seal Stones." - Nephilim, Gigant, Lilim and Lith can only be found in necropolises or catacombs. 3. Collecting seal stones and claiming rewards: - During the Seven Signs competition, if the Revolutionaries of Dusk win, you will receive a reward for collecting seal stones. - The reward will be in proportion to the number of seal stones given to a priest during the competition, and is paid in the form of Ancient Adena. You can claim your reward by visiting a Dusk Priestess, located in each village.
